question: ####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) [UFAQ 22](http://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/The_Devil_and_the_Dragon_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs] After the Corp installs a card for the first time in a turn, who decides first? * (A) Does the Runner decide to use the ability, forcing the Corp to pay 1 or expose the card, or * (B) Does the Corp decide whether or not to pay 1, allowing the Runner to choose whether or not the card should be exposed?
